name: Akroma, Angel of Wrath
text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red

editions.flavor: "No rest. No mercy. No matter what."

editions.set: Duel Decks Anthology, Divine vs. Demonic
editions.flavor: "Wrath is no vice when inflicted upon the deserving."
"Wrath is no vice when inflicted upon the deserving."
"No rest. No mercy. No matter what."
"Wrath is no vice when inflicted upon the deserving."

name: Akroma's Devoted
text: Cleric creatures have vigilance.

editions.flavor: Akroma asked for only one thing from her troops: unwavering, unconditional loyalty.

name: Aphetto Exterminator
text:
Morph {3}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Aphetto Exterminator is turned face up, target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

name: Aven Envoy
text: Flying

editions.flavor: Their grieving faces tell far more than a list of casualties ever could.

name: Aven Redeemer
text:
Flying
{T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

editions.flavor: Redeemers rise with the sun, and the spirits of the people rise with them.

name: Aven Warhawk
text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Bird and/or Soldier card you reveal in your hand.)

name: Bane of the Living
text:
Morph {X}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Bane of the Living is turned face up, all creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.

name: Beacon of Destiny
text: {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, that damage is dealt to Beacon of Destiny instead.

editions.flavor: "We all borrowed life from the Ancestor to exist in this world. Today, I repay that debt."

name: Berserk Murlodont
text: Whenever a Beast becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

editions.flavor:
"The harder we press forward, the harder Krosa pushes us back."
—Aven scout

name: Blade Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures get +1/+0.

editions.flavor: After breaking free from the Riptide Project, the slivers quickly adapted to life on Otaria—much to the dismay of life on Otaria.

name: Blood Celebrant
text: {B}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

editions.flavor:
"Their blood is the nectar that nourishes the Cabal."
—Phage the Untouchable

name: Bloodstoke Howler
text:
Morph {6}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Bloodstoke Howler is turned face up, Beast creatures you control get +3/+0 until end of turn.

name: Branchsnap Lorian
text:
Trample
Morph {G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

editions.flavor: Lorians treat trees and prey the same way: by ripping them limb from limb.

name: Brontotherium
text:
Trample
Provoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)

editions.flavor: Lucky victims get run over. Unlucky victims get run through.

name: Brood Sliver
text: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may put a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token onto the battlefield.

editions.flavor: Within weeks, more slivers nested in Otaria than ever existed on Rath.
Within weeks, more slivers nested in Otaria than ever existed on Rath.

name: Caller of the Claw
text:
Flash

text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Beast card you reveal in your hand.)
{T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each +1/+1 counter on Canopy Crawler.

text:
Flying

text: Whenever Skirk Drill Sergeant or another Goblin dies, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a Goblin permanent card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

editions.set: Duel Decks Anthology, Elves vs. Goblins
editions.flavor: "I order you to volunteer."
"I order you to volunteer."

name: Skirk Marauder
text:
Morph {2}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Skirk Marauder is turned face up, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

name: Skirk Outrider
text: As long as you control a Beast, Skirk Outrider gets +2/+2 and has trample.

editions.flavor: Once the goblins thought about it, they preferred being atop a slateback to being in front of, behind, or underneath one.

name: Smokespew Invoker
text: {7}{B}: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: The Mirari festers in its flesh.

name: Sootfeather Flock
text:
Flying
Morph {3}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

editions.flavor: They pick at the remains of the city's corpse.

name: Spectral Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."

editions.flavor:
"Sure, I've seen agents of the Cabal here and there. Well, not here, and certainly not in any of the sliver labs. Oh dear, I've said too much."
—Apprentice researcher

name: Starlight Invoker
text: {7}{W}: You gain 5 life.

editions.flavor: The Mirari glows in her eyes.
"The constellations form a tapestry of light that traces my people's broken history. Day and night, I feel their glittering presence calling me to weave the pattern whole."

name: Stoic Champion
text: Whenever a player cycles a card, Stoic Champion gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: His outer calm belies his inner fury.
His outer calm belies his inner fury.

name: Stonewood Invoker
text: {7}{G}: Stonewood Invoker gets +5/+5 until end of turn.

editions.set: Duel Decks Anthology, Elves vs. Goblins

text:
Sunstrike Legionnaire doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, untap Sunstrike Legionnaire.
{T}: Tap target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less.

name: Swooping Talon
text:
Flying
{1}: Swooping Talon loses flying until end of turn.
Provoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)

name: Synapse Sliver
text: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may draw a card.

editions.flavor:
"Species XR17 feeds upon the mental energies of its victims. This explains why the goblins remain unaffected."
—Riptide Project researcher

name: Timberwatch Elf
text: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.

editions.flavor: Even through the Mirari's voice, the elves still hear the call of their kinship.

name: Totem Speaker
text: Whenever a Beast enters the battlefield, you may gain 3 life.

editions.flavor: "Elves and beasts are tied together, and I am the knot that binds them."

name: Toxin Sliver
text: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.

editions.flavor: It doesn't need to use its venom—it just needs you to know it can.

name: Tribal Forcemage
text:
Morph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Tribal Forcemage is turned face up, creatures of the creature type of your choice get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

name: Unstable Hulk
text:
Morph {3}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Unstable Hulk is turned face up, it gets +6/+6 and gains trample until end of turn. You skip your next turn.

name: Vexing Beetle
text:
Vexing Beetle can't be countered.
Vexing Beetle gets +3/+3 as long as no opponent controls a creature.

editions.flavor: As the Mirari's mutating effects grew out of control, centaurs and druids fled—but insects swarmed closer.

name: Vile Deacon
text: Whenever Vile Deacon attacks, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Clerics on the battlefield.

editions.flavor: "The Cabal and the Order really aren't that different. After all, we are both empowered by faith."

name: Voidmage Apprentice
text:
Morph {2}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Voidmage Apprentice is turned face up, counter target spell.

text:
Morph {X}{X}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Warbreak Trumpeter is turned face up, put X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.

name: Ward Sliver
text:
As Ward Sliver enters the battlefield, choose a color.
All Slivers have protection from the chosen color.

editions.flavor: The first wave of slivers perished from the Riptide wizards' magic. The second wave shrugged off their spells like water.

name: Warped Researcher
text: Whenever a player cycles a card, Warped Researcher gains flying and shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

editions.flavor: New insights yield new senses.

name: Weaver of Lies
text:
Morph {4}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Weaver of Lies is turned face up, turn any number of target creatures with morph abilities other than Weaver of Lies face down.

name: Whipgrass Entangler
text: {1}{W}: Until end of turn, target creature gains "This creature can't attack or block unless its controller pays {1} for each Cleric on the battlefield."

editions.flavor: "Now that I have your attention, perhaps I can tell you of the Order."

name: White Knight
text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)
